mapper.select: select n.idx as idx,f.fname as fname,f.price as price,n.count as count,n.today as today from food f Inner JOIN singlebasket n on f.idx=n.fidx where n.midx=#{midx} and residx=0
select NVL(Max(s.count),0) from singlebasket s where midx=#{midx} and fidx=#{fidx} and residx=0 and today=to_char(sysdate,'DD/MM/RR') and restime=to_char(#{restime})
mapper.update: UPDATE singlebasket set count=count+1 where fidx=#{fidx} and midx=#{midx} and restime = #{restime} and residx=0 and today=to_date(sysdate,'DD/MM/RR')
